description: A relationship of a given type between a super-instance and a sub-instance

superInstanceId.description: ID (a UUID) of the super-instance. References an Instance record

subInstanceId.description: ID (a UUID) of the sub-instance. References an Instance record

instanceRelationshipTypeId.description: ID (a UUID) of the InstanceRelationshipType. References controlled vocabulary InstanceRelationshipTypes. Indicates the type of relationship between two Instance records.
